author: tisi
title: Veeeeeeeeeery basic, but never look a gift-horse in the mouth...
review:
I got this small set as a gift in a non-official Lego Store in my country. (They renewed their store, it was a special offer.) Details below.

Box/Instructions

Very small polybag, no instructions.

Parts

Small, basic parts, mainly slopes, two plates and a brick. The main colours are black and white.

The build

Nothing special there. Each models take half a minute to build.

The completed model

I've built all the models. The penguin is the best, it's neat. The strange animal in the upper right corner (which supposed to be maybe a kind of bird) is not so good, its wings(?) are too small compared to its legs. The whale is a typical 'B-model', but it's creative.

Summary

I think most of the Lego fans can build this small set from his/her collection. If you get it as a gift, be happy about it. But don't buy it - I saw this set for sale on the Internet, and it costs too much. Doesn't worth the money!
